detectors.description:

LaunchLexTokenLite(string,string,uint8,address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes32,bool) should be declared external:
	- LexTokenLiteFactory.LaunchLexTokenLite(string,string,uint8,address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes32,bool) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d51153899a050485b12ea2f9e4accf58e6107ea5_LexTokenLite.sol#238-266)
Moreover, the following function parameters should change its data location:
_name location should be calldata
_symbol location should be calldata
